name: English Gujarati Dictionary
description: Fast, free and offline English to Gujarati Dictionary app by SHABDKOSH.COM! This English Gujarati Dictionary app brings our trusted content and service to Android users. This English Gujarati Dictionary has one of the most comprehensive Gujarati and English vocabulary you will find in any English to Gujarati Dictionary App on the Google Play store. This app has a user-friendly English Gujarati Dictionary along with English definitions, quiz game, spoken English and Gujarati audio pronunciations, synonyms and antonyms.  Best of all, you can download the English Gujarati Offline Dictionary in Settings screen and use this app without any data connection.  GUJARATI ENGLISH DICTIONARY AND TRANSLATION Start typing Gujarati words using Gujarati keyboard, or type Gujarati words in English and have the SHABDKOSH app suggest you words even when you are not typing in Gujarati! Tap any suggestion to get the English translation, meanings and spoken audio pronunciations. Tap the star icon to save the word for future reference.  ENGLISH GUJARATI DICTIONARY AND TRANSLATION Type the English word and see immediate suggestions from the huge collection of words and get to the meaning quickly by tapping any suggested word in the list. The SHABDKOSH English Gujarati dictionary app shows exact meanings, definitions and short examples along with translations, synonym, antonym and right grammar attributes. You can also choose to listen to the audio pronunciation or see the pronunciation in Gujarati - another unique feature of this app!  HYPERLINKED ENGLISH GUJARATI DICTIONARY FOR REVERSE LOOKUP Any tap on the meanings will take you to the reverse lookup any of the meanings. This helps you in understanding more of each word shown by presenting this unique cross-search feature.  SPOKEN AUDIO PRONUNCIATIONS IN ENGLISH AND GUJARATI  The Shabdkosh Offline English Gujarati Dictionary app has the best spoken audio pronunciation in a pleasant Indian voice - for both, English and Gujarati. Just tap the speaker icon on any word or meaning to hear the spoken audio pronunciation with a very small amount of data usage.  LEARN SOMETHING NEW EVERY DAY We have show the most popular searches of the day to help you keep up to date with new words being used in news, media and other places that other users are searching for.  WORD GAMES The nifty Word Quiz Game Quiz in English and Gujarati helps you pass time while learning something new! The users of Shabdkosh English Gujarati Offline Dictionary App are very fond of this simple and quick games - which also works without using your data in offline mode.  CONTACT & FEEDBACK For any help and support on the Shabdkosh English Gujarati offline dictionary, please use the feedback option in the app. For more information and to try it out on web, please visit: http://www.shabdkosh.com This Gujarati to English dictionary is also available on mobile browsers at http://www.shabdkosh.com. We hope you will like it - and review it in the Google Play Store!  SHABDKOSH English Gujarati Offline Dictionary App - Presented by SHABDKOSH.COM    - .
